changelog.title: Progress Tracking
changelog.description: XP and leveling system now visible on dashboard. Complete modules and quizzes to earn XP and level up!

changelog.title: Stats Dashboard
changelog.description: Track modules completed, quizzes passed, achievements earned, and daily learning streaks.

changelog.title: 15 Levels to Master
changelog.description: Progress from Level 1 to Level 15 Master. Each activity awards XP based on difficulty.

changelog.title: Achievement Integration
changelog.description: Achievement count now displays on dashboard. Unlock achievements by completing learning milestones.
